items.title: One of Goldman's big trade recommendations for rest of year is gold miners
items.description: The Wall Street investment bank figures gold prices will rise another 14% through 2026.

items.title: Bank of America sees 'attractive entry point' in Kenvue after Tylenol controversy sparks sell-off
items.description: The firm remains bullish on the stock, noting it's trading at a discount to the average of peer names in household and personal care.

items.title: Here are Monday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Apple, Tesla, Palantir, Oracle, Chewy, Roblox, Alphabet & more
items.description: Here are Monday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

items.title: Nvidia gets a price target cut from Citi as competition in AI arena grows
items.description: Analyst Atif Malik kept his buy rating on Nvidia but trimmed his price target by $10.

items.title: Buy this cloud stock that continues to eat up market share, JPMorgan says
items.description: Analyst Alexei Gogolev upgraded the stock to overweight from neutral.
